description: This easy air-fryer recipe will become the kids' fave new snack, with the crisp pineapple chips creating a different flavour burst.
keywords: Finger food,Pescatarian,Air fryer,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Pineapple,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: AirFryer Pineapple Chips Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Slice pineapple into 2mmthick slices. Pat dry with paper towel.

Preheat air fryer to 140Â°C for 2 minutes. Working in 4 batches, place fruit, in a single layer, in basket. Cook for 15 minutes, turning halfway through cooking, or until fruit is dry and crisp. Serve.
